sentences.sContent: Coal is one of the cheapest fuels.
sentences.sCn: 煤是最廉价的燃料之一。

sentences.sContent: ...If fossil fuel prices remain low for a long time...
...There is strong evidence that both innovation and adoption of cleaner technology are strongly encouraged by higher fossil fuel prices...
...Notwithstanding important recent progress in developing renewable fuel sources...
...low fossil fuel prices are not accurately signaling to markets the true social profitability of clean energy...
...Even major fossil fuel exporting countries have great potential to develop renewable energies...
...low fossil fuel prices could discourage further innovation in...
...if fossil fuel prices remain low for long...

...The International Monetary Fund calculates that countries can generate substantial fiscal revenues by eliminating fossil fuel subsidies and levying carbon charges that capture the domestic damage caused by emissions...
...Even Africa and the Middle East，home to economies that are heavily dependent on fossil fuel exports...
...Higher fossil fuel prices prove to be conducive to innovation and application of cleaner technology...

if you fuel a vehicle, or if it fuels up, fuel is put into it
